subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: If the original intent of the M.V.P. Award — to honor the player most valuable to his team — is kept, there is a case to be made that the Warriors’ Curry should have finished behind other players.
snippet: If the original intent of the M.V.P. Award — to honor the player most valuable to his team — is kept, there is a case to be made that the Warriors’ Curry should have finished behind other players.
